meanings: Verb do a part time job, have a side job, moonlight

vlive.korean: [Q. 6년 동안 같은 아르바이트를 해 온 이유는?] [Q. Why did you keep doing the same part time job for 6 years?] View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 18. 용인대 리퍼블릭 VS 고려대 테라 배틀에 심사위원 실화?!
vlive.english: [Q. Why did you keep doing the same part time job for 6 years?]

vlive.korean: 아르바이트.. 힘들지 않아? Part-time job... Isn't it hard? 듣기 View video 렛스튜디오 (LETstudio) : 친구에게 배신감을 느낄 때 [웹드라마 여름방학 Ep04] Letfilm
할 일은 없겠지만 혹시 해보고 싶은 아르바이트가 있다면? Is there any part time job you would want to try if you got a chance? 듣기 View video AB6IX : AB6IX (에이비식스) 100 DAYS❗ - DAE HWI
vlive.english: Is there any part time job you would want to try if you got a chance?

vlive.korean: 그리고 아르바이트를... There are also part-timers... 듣기 View video SF9 : [빈,us] 직장🍀
"아름... 아르바이트" 뭐야? "Part...part time..." What is that? 듣기 View video MONSTA X : LIVE : 190607

examples.korean: As a part-time job, I have been writing reviews for magazines on new Information Technology trends. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아르바이트로 잡지에 신 정보기술 동향에 대한 리뷰를 쓰면서 제 작문 실력을 연마했습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: As a part-time job, I have been writing reviews for magazines on new Information Technology trends. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: As a part-time job, I write reviews for a magazine geared toward new computer products. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 저는 아르바이트로 컴퓨터 신제품들을 다루는 잡지에 리뷰를 씁니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: As a part-time job, I write reviews for a magazine geared toward new computer products. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I just finished university this year, majoring in economics. While I was in school, I had the chance to work as a part-timer in a trading corporation for two years. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 경제학 전공으로 올해 막 졸업했는데 재학 중 무역회사에서 2년간 아르바이트를 할 기회가 있었습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I just finished university this year, majoring in economics. While I was in school, I had the chance to work as a part-timer in a trading corporation for two years. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I am afraid I did not have chance to do any part-time jobs. However, I had a volunteer experience working as a receptionist at a free medical clinic for migrant workers while I was in college. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아르바이트 경험은 없었습니다만, 학창시절에 이주 노동자를 위한 무료 진료소에서 접수원으로 자원봉사를 한 경험은 있습니다. DARAKWON
examples.english: I am afraid I did not have chance to do any part-time jobs. However, I had a volunteer experience working as a receptionist at a free medical clinic for migrant workers while I was in college. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Have you had any part-time job? 듣기 Add to Wordbook 파트타임(아르바이트) 경험이 있습니까? DARAKWON
examples.english: Have you had any part-time job? Add to Wordbook
